node.hospital_zh: 雅麗氏何妙齡那打素醫院
node.hospital_en: Alice Ho Miu Ling Nethersole Hospital
node.detail_zh: 患者有長期病患，為大圍救世軍隆亨長者之家院友，7 月 23 日入住威爾斯親王醫院接受治療，並於 30 日轉送雅麗氏何妙齡那打素醫院繼續留醫；患者其後情況轉差，延至 9 月 8 日上午 8 時 57 分離世。他無外遊紀錄， 沒有病徵，與第 #2305、#2052、#2224、#2405 及 #2506 宗個案患者有關連。
node.detail_en: The patient has underlying health conditions, is a resident of Salvation Army Lung Hang Residence for Senior Citizens in Tai Wai. On July 23, he was hospitalized to Prince of Wales Hospital. On July 30th, he was transferred to Alice Ho Miu Ling Nethersole Hospital. His condition deteriorated and he passed away on Sept 8 at 8:57am. He had no travel history and exhibited no symptoms. His case is epidemiologically related to those of patients #2305, #2052, #2224, #2405, and #2506.
node.classification_zh: 本地個案的密切接觸者

groups.description_en: This clusters accounts for the residents of The Salvation Army Lung Hang Residence For Senior Citizens, as well as related cooks, janitors, administrative staff, and family members. The cluster numbers at over ten people.
